SEARCH
Package chess.logic.board

Class BoardData

java.lang.Object
chess.logic.board.BoardData
public class BoardData extends Object
The `BoardData` class provides utility methods and data structures related to the chess board layout. It includes constants for representing various characteristics of the chess board, such as ranks, files, algebraic notation, and mappings between positions and coordinates.
